SourceString: Gaining <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</> grants your <me_Summon>Summons</> an additional <b>{Dmg}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased Damage

While below <b>{Threshold}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</>, gain <b>{Scrap}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)</> <me_DivineCore>Divine Cores</> every <b>{Period}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</>
Gain <b>25%</> increased Total Elemental Damage, if you have consumed all 3 types of <me_ElementalInfusion>Elemental Infusion</> in the last <b>6s</>
Consuming <me_ElementalInfusion>Elemental Infusion</> grants an additional <b>{EleDmgIncrease}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased Elemental Damage
Your <me_Summon>Summons</> have <b>{SmnHealthIncrease}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased Health if you have a shield equipped

When you place a <me_Device>Device</> <me_Summon>Summon</>, deal <b>{StrikeDmg}|floor()</> <me_StrikeDam>Strike Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)m</> radius around the <me_Device>Device</>
Consuming <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</> grants you an additional <b>{DmgIncrease}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)%</> increased Damage
When you consume <me_Overwhelm>Overwhelm</>, your activatable <me_Device>Devices</> recover <b>{Activation}|floor()</> <me_Activation>Activations</>
<b>+{AddMinBulwark}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)</> Minimum <me_Bulwark>Bulwark</> while you have a shield equipped
Your <me_Device>Devices</> are immune to Damage for <b>{Duration}|fmt(min_frac=0,max_frac=1)s</> after creation
Maximum: 30\r\nUsed as a resource for some Forge abilities.
DevComment: This still needs a logic connection so it can display the actual maximum that is adjusted by stats etc.
